objects.text:
• Luxurious Eau de Parfum concentration
• Sophisticated dark blue bottle design
• Complex blend of fresh and woody notes
• Perfect for confident, modern gentlemen
AUTHENTIC DESIGNER FRAGRANCE WITH DISTINCTIVE CHARACTER

product_details.name: Dior Sauvage EDP - The Essence of Raw Elegance
product_details.description:
• Luxurious Eau de Parfum concentration for enhanced longevity
• Sophisticated dark blue bottle design with premium glass construction
• Signature Dior craftsmanship and quality
• Complex blend of fresh and woody notes
• Perfect for confident, modern gentlemen
• Long-lasting fragrance suitable for day and evening wear
• Prestigious French luxury perfume house creation
• Elegant ribbed cap design with magnetic closure
• Versatile scent suitable for all seasons
• Authentic designer fragrance with distinctive character

banner_details:
This banner features a bold and luxurious layout promoting a high-end fragrance. The design is anchored by a dominant title text (`heading`) in uppercase white font, set against a deep navy gradient background that creates a sleek and masculine aesthetic. Below it, a soft blue subheading (`subheading`) introduces the theme of refined elegance. Key selling points are listed clearly using the `description` text layer in bullet points, highlighting fragrance features. A featured product image (`product_image`) is prominently placed on the right side, ensuring product focus. Attention-grabbing promotional tags (`tagline_1`, `tagline_2`, `tagline_3`, and `tagline_4`) appear throughout with varying weight and color. A large price (`price`) in light blue and a bold call-to-action button (`cta_button` and `cta`) at the bottom encourage immediate purchase.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Navy: #0D1F2D (background)
- Sky Blue: #3F7EA9 (accent, button)
- Powder Blue: #8AABCB (subheadings, price)
- Pure White: #FFFFFF (main text, CTA text)
- Pale Slate: #D9DEEA (fine print)
product_color: The product image for Dior Sauvage Eau de Parfum prominently features a sleek and modern color palette dominated by deep midnight blue (#0A0F2C) and accents of electric cobalt blue (#1C3FB3). The bottle transitions smoothly from nearly black at the top to a luminous blue base, creating a gradient effect that conveys elegance and mystery. Subtle highlights and reflections in icy blue (#B4C9FF) add depth and sophistication. The text and logo appear in stark white (#FFFFFF), offering a sharp contrast that emphasizes branding and readability. This polished blend of cool tones evokes luxury, boldness, and masculine strength—ideal for a high-end advertisement banner.
